short_summary: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is requesting proposals for the acquisition of a no-till four-row vegetable transplanter
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc4267776733 dated October 20, 2023 with a closing of November 16, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offereurs/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.  PWGSC, on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition of a no-till four-row vegetable transplanter including training and delivery, located in Sainte-Clotilde-De-Ch\Action A.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information
* Title: Request for Proposal No. WS4258240149 
* Reference Number: WS4258240149
* Publication Date: December 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 10, 2024 (14:00:00)

#### Contract Information
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: December 1, 2024
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 

#### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Deliverables
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking the acquisition of a no-till four-row vegetable transplanter including training and delivery (Annex A). The transplanter will be located in Sainte-Clotilde-De-Châteauguay, Quebec, Canada.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Melanie Caty at [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Related Documents
Please refer to the following link for the complete tender description: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18321613?extsite=MTgzMjE2MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note: The above document also cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc4267776733 issued on October 20, 2023, with a closing date of November 16, 2023. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted an offer in the previous solicitation.  I removed the redundant field entries, and it the french information in the original document. If you would like me to restore the bilingual information, just let me know! I am happy to assist you. 

Let me know if this is complete and fine for you!
